item.description:
let's get together to meet one another, share surf stories and experiences, and talk about future events that people are interested in seeing happen. This group hasn't been very active, and I want to try and change that. It all starts with people getting to know one another. So please RSVP if you are interested, and suggest a venue and/or day. Looking forward to meeting you!

**We have a reservation for 7pm, so when you get there tell the host you are with the surfing meetup group
item.why: This group hasn't been very active in the past, and I want to try and change that.
item.name: social hour / cocktails
